maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastrenderpasswrapper.h
/*

#ifndef BEAST_RENDERPASS_WRAPPER_H
#define BEAST_RENDERPASS_WRAPPER_H

#include "beastwrappers/beastfundamentalswrapper.h"
#include <beastapi/beastrenderpass.h>

namespace beastmaya {

class BeastRenderPass : public BeastObject<ILBRenderPassHandle> {
public:
        BeastRenderPass(ILBRenderPassHandle h) : BeastObject<ILBRenderPassHandle>(h) {
        }
};

class BeastLightPassEntry : public BeastObject<ILBLightPassEntryHandle> {
public:
        BeastLightPassEntry(ILBLightPassEntryHandle h) : BeastObject<ILBLightPassEntryHandle>(h) {
        }

        void addLightToPass(BeastLight& light);
        void addTargetToPass(BeastTargetEntity& target);
};

class BeastLightPass : public BeastRenderPass {
public:
        BeastLightPass(ILBRenderPassHandle h) : BeastRenderPass(h) {
        }

        BeastLightPassEntryPtr createLightPassEntry();
};

class BeastRNMPass : public BeastRenderPass {
public:
        BeastRNMPass(ILBRenderPassHandle h) : BeastRenderPass(h) {
        }

        void setAllowNegative(ILBRNMAllowNegative allow);
        void includeNormalComponent();
        void addCustomBasisVector(const ILBVec3& vec);

};

class BeastAmbientOcclusionPass : public BeastRenderPass {
public:
        BeastAmbientOcclusionPass(ILBRenderPassHandle h) : BeastRenderPass(h) {
        }

        void setContrast(float contrast, float scale);
        void setUniformSampling();
        void setSelfOcclusion(ILBAOSelfOcclusion selfOcclusion);

};

}

#endif // BEAST_RENDERPASS_WRAPPER_H
